Trevor_Review.description: By far the best movie I have ever seen. It exceeded expectations (which were very high). Christopher Nolan is a genius and this was his best work. I love history movies and this was such an interesting story about a horrific event, executed to perfection.

Taylor_Review.description: Insane movie. The musical score was classic Christopher Nolan, absolutely mindblowing. I was engaged the whole movie, and how it all came together at the end, it was *chefs kiss*!
